name: SwiftyStringScore
summary: Swift string search and fuzzy ranking. Score of 0 for no match; up to 1 for perfect.
description: Swift string search and fuzzy ranking. Score of 0 for no match; up to 1 for perfect. SwiftyStringScore is a Swift library which provides fast fuzzy string matching/scoring. Based on the JavaScript library of the same name, by Joshaven Potter.
